name: Saurav Kumar Mishra

education.school: Maharaja Agrasen Insitute of Technology, GGSIPU
Guru Nanak Dev Institute of Technology, BTE Delhi

projects.name: Blogging Platform
projects.description: Developed a full-stack blog platform with MERN and Redux Toolkit, achieving a 30% reduction in feature development time. Integrated Cloudinary for image management, increasing upload efficiency by 40%. Enabled users to post, read, update, and delete blogs, with a responsive UI built using Tailwind CSS, enhancing user engagement by 25%.

projects.name: FullStack E-commerce
projects.description: Developed OneStopShop, an e-commerce application using React.js and Vanilla CSS, enhancing user experience and interface responsiveness by 40%. Implemented pagination, improving product browsing efficiency by 50%.

projects.name: Self-Portfolio
projects.description: Developed a dynamic portfolio using React, integrating EmailJS for direct communication, improving response time by 50%. Designed a responsive, visually appealing interface with smooth navigation and interactive elements, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement.

experiences.description: Developing a food ordering app using React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Redux Toolkit. Enabled user authentication, profile management, and secure payment integration. Features include restaurant browsing, menu viewing, cart management, and order placement with responsive design.
Participating in a 6-week virtual IBM SkillsBuild internship to gain experience in front-end web development.

Developed a landing page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enhancing visual appeal and user engagement. Created a portfolio website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase skills and projects effectively. Built a calculator application using JavaScript, demonstrating proficiency in scripting and logic implementation.
